algorithm_technique: Frequency counting and reverse iteration to identify characters with maximum frequency.
problem_summary_simple: Find the string just before the last operation where all characters are removed one by one based on their first occurrence.
problem_summary_technical: Calculates character frequencies, finds the maximum frequency, and then iterates backward through the string to reconstruct the last non-empty string based on this maximum frequency.
key_insights: The operation removes the *first* occurrence of each character in alphabetical order.
The characters that remain until the very last operation are those that appeared most frequently.
Iterating backward through the string allows us to efficiently build the result by considering characters that should persist.
